articles.title: Google taps India’s love for gold to boost its credit play - TechCrunch

articles.title: Base Variant Of Samsung’s Galaxy S25 Lineup To Feature Dimensity 9400 Chip Instead Of Snapdragon 8 Gen 4, Possibly Due To Lower Cost - Wccftech
